activities: Fulcrum markets data recovery service plans for computer hard drives. In order to obtain services under these plans, purchasers must register their purchased contracts on web sites hosted by Fulcrum. Such data is used solely for the provision of services under these plans by Fulcrum and its contracted agents.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect name, address, and other contact information about customers. In addition, we may also collect information about service plans the customer has purchased, equipment covered by a service plan, and communications between a customer and Fulcrum regarding the provision of services under plans the customer has purchased.
